effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user lets loose a blast of aura power from deep within its body at the target. This attack never misses.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user lets loose a blast of aura power from deep within its body at the target. This attack never misses.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user lets loose a blast of aura power from deep within its body at the target. This attack never misses.
